alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 1:10PM EDT until May 12 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 145 PM EDT/1245 PM CDT/. * At 110 PM EDT/1210 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blountstown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Bristol, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Estiffanulga, Sharpstown, Woods, Hugh Creek and Durham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
